main_definition: a word used to refer to a specific time or condition, often in questions and idioms.

meanings_and_examples.definition: to indicate the time at which something happens
meanings_and_examples.example: I usually go for a run when it's not too hot outside.

meanings_and_examples.definition: used in questions to ask about time or condition
indicating that something happens under certain conditions
meanings_and_examples.example: You can't see the stars when it's a full moon.

meanings_and_examples.definition: used to introduce examples or exceptions in statements
meanings_and_examples.example: There are many ways to solve this problem, but only some will work well; for example, when using certain formulas, you may need additional data.

meanings_and_examples.definition: used to connect two ideas or actions that happen simultaneously or have a cause-effect relationship
meanings_and_examples.example: When she realized her mistake, she immediately apologized.
